comments.body: Fixed.  Thank you for reporting this.

description:
Delete datasource action does not work correctly. datasource delete action 
produces following HTML by datasources.jspf:

  <input type="checkbox" name="dataSources" 
          
value="Catalina:type=Resource,resourcetype=Global,class=javax.sql.DataSource,na
me="mydatasource"" styleId="dataSources">

At least, double quote is invalid.

regards,

Takashi Okamoto
